feed.title: Port au Choix - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:43 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Port au Choix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:58 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Daniel's Harbour 4:30 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: -0.2°C
Wind: S 34 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to flurries this evening. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 late this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Risk of snow squalls early in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 in the morning. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 19 March 2023
